extension.name: OVH mailinglist API
extension.description: API to manage the subscription to an OVH hosted mailing list. This extension provide API to add/remove a contact to a given OVH mailing list (modify) and to synchornise a group with a given OVH mailing list (sync). The corresponding CiviRules actions are also provided.
extension.comments: Original code based on the E-mail API extension https://github.com/CiviCooP/org.civicoop.emailapi
